titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of State to deny passports to noncustodial parents subject to State arrest warrants in cases of nonpayment of child support.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/5/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of State to refuse, revoke, restrict, or limit a passport in cases where the applicant or passport holder is a noncustodial parent who is the subject of an outstanding State warrant of arrest for nonpayment of child support where the amount in controversy is not less than $10,000.
